snippet.title: Puyo Puyo Tetris 2 | Turn the Tables Trailer
snippet.description:
Challenge the new Skill Battle mode featuring an RPG-inspired twist in Puyo Puyo Tetris 2! You can also hop online and play casually or competitively in game-specific leagues or enjoy Free Play with up to three of your friends (or enemies)!

https://puyo.sega.com/tetris2
